name: Portfolio
description: This is my portfolio website. I built it with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. I used Material UI for the icons and the contact form. I also used the react-reveal library for the animations. I deployed it on Vercel.

name: Tesla Homepage
description: This is a clone of the Tesla homepage. I built it with React and Next.js. I used Tailwind CSS for the styling. I also used the react-reveal library for the animations. I deployed it on Vercel.

name: League of Legends player search
description: This is a League of Legends player search app. I built it with React and CSS. I used the Riot API to get the player data. I deployed it on Heroku.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This is a weather dashboard app that allows users to search for a city and see the current weather and a five-day forecast. I built it with jQuery, Bootstrap, and the OpenWeather API. I deployed it on Heroku.

name: Note Taker
description: This is a note taker app that allows users to create, save, and delete notes. I built it with JavaScript, Node, Express, and HTML/CSS. I deployed it on Heroku.

name: My Tech Blog
description: This is my tech blog. I built it with JavaScript, Express, mySQL, and Handlebars. I deployed it on Heroku.
